messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: WELCOME TO THE ANNUAL SPACE STATION 13 DEATH BATTLE!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: LET THE 100TH ANNUAL DEATH BATTLE BEGIN!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Detective's Office.
